General.Name: Isik Plastik Sanayi ve Dis Ticaret Pazarlama AS
General.Description: Isik Plastik Sanayi Ve Dis Ticaret Pazarlama Anonim Sirketi provides plastic products in Turkey and internationally. Its products include solid polycarbonate and acrylic sheets, pet-G sheets, multiwall sheets, noise barriers, non-glare sheets, flame retardant sheets, and accessories; disposable containers, drinking cups, pots and lids, and plates; and masterbatch compounds. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Gebze, Turkey.

1.Name: Guven  Celikay
1.Title: Assistant Gen. Mang. for Financial Affairs
